name: Screw You 2
description: Screw you but it screws you even more !

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: If the mod is enabled or not

return-value.name: Return value
return-value.description: The return value in the hooked initizalize's function. If this setting's value is `false`, there is a very high chance that your game will crash. Else, the node just won't initizalize

intensity.name: Intensity
intensity.description: How many classes will be 'killed' on death
